author: bmwlego
title: McDonald's Swamp Boat
review: I am not sure who the dog is but at least the part is printed and not a sticker. The color scheme of red and black with a pop of yellow works for me. A propeller is included which is the only other specialty part in the set besides the printed slope. The design of the model is lacking and looks like a giveaway from a happy meal toy. I would love to go in to a McDonald's and buy a Happy Meal with a LEGO toy in it, not a Bionicle like they are giving away presently.
